title: Is using bot program  in aram allowed?
body: I started  a new acount and 10  games in a row i see half of both teams being players that use the bot, the rest of the players we agree to report for them cheating/3rd party software and i never seen any feedback while if i report a player for saying noob,feed,ugly skin etc i always get notification in 2 minutes max so is it legal now or something?????

replies.body: No, they ban in waves though, and, unfortunately, they are persistent. Blame people who boost or buy accounts.
you don't always get notified. but no it is not allowed
i dream of a day when players can buy level 30 accounts from riot and will not have to resort to 3rd parties.
